text: A yesli by kazhdaya dusha, kotoraya ne uverovala i vzyala pomimo Allakha sotovarishchey, ovladela vsem, chto na zemle, ona otdala by eto za to, chtoby izbezhat' nakazaniya v Den' Strashnogo Suda, kogda lyudi voochiyu uvidyat uzhasy i pochuvstvuyut raskayaniye i sozhaleniye v glubine svoikh dush, poskol'ku oni ne v sostoyanii budut vyrazit' ikh slovami pri vide muchitel'nogo nakazaniya, navodyashchego na nikh sil'nyy strakh. Eto nakazaniye oni zasluzhenno ponesut za ikh nechestivyye deyaniya, kotoryye sovershili v zemnoy zhizni
